name: Playbook: Create Python CLI Calculator
yaml_template:
id: "{task_id}"
name: "Create Python CLI Calculator"
type: "composite"
goal: "{goal}"
definition_of_done: "calculator.py exists with CLI add/sub/mul/div operations and sample runs complete successfully with expected results"
stop_rules:
  max_attempts: 3
  max_minutes: 10
  max_tool_calls: 40
on_fail: "escalate"
